title: ICE Denver removes man wanted in El Salvador
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Salvadoran national and foreign fugitive Jose Eduardo Moran-Garcia, 28, to El Salvador via air transportation. Moran is wanted in his home country for aggravated homicide, displacement of individuals, unlawful groupings and aggravated robbery.

title: Father, son arrested on fentanyl trafficking, gun sales and immigration violations following ICE, multiagency investigation
description: A father and son were arrested for trafficking fentanyl and illegal firearms sales following an investigation conducted by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement assisted by multiple federal and state law enforcement agencies.

title: ICE arrests illegal Mexican national involved in 2014 vehicular homicide of 13-year-old girl
description: ICE arrested Ramiro Guevara, a 46-year-old Mexican national, who was involved in a 2014 vehicle accident resulting in the death of a 13-year-old girl and had an outstanding deportation order.

title: Florida sex offender sentenced to 15 years for distribution of child sexual abuse material
description: A Florida man was sentenced to 15 years in federal prison for distributing child sexual abuse material on social media following a task force investigation that included U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

title: Multiagency investigation results in Cartel Del Noreste leader sentencing for murder-for-hire, kidnapping conspiracies
description: A Cartel Del Noreste leader was sentenced for his role in a murder-for-hire scheme involving bringing hitmen across the U.S. border into Laredo. The leader coordinated the kidnapping and murder of an individual the cartel believed had stolen from them.

title: International law enforcement cooperation leads to takedown and immigration arrests of alien smugglers in US and Brazil
description: A coordinated enforcement operation between U.S. and Brazilian law enforcement resulted in the arrest of an alien smuggler in Worcester, MA, and the execution of search warrants in Brazil. The operation targeted a transnational criminal organization allegedly responsible for smuggling individuals from Brazil to the United States.

title: ICE Arizona, multiagency case results in Nogales man sentenced to 10 years in prison for methamphetamine possession, intent to distribute
description: A Nogales man was sentenced to 120 months in prison for possession with the intent to distribute methamphetamine. The case was investigated by multiple agencies, including ICE.

title: ICE Salt Lake City removes foreign fugitive for sexual assault of minor
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Mexican citizen and foreign fugitive Jairo Ivan Paredes Cota, 43, to Mexico via ground transportation. Paredes is wanted in his home country for the sexual assault of a minor.

title: ICE arrests Brazilian national convicted of drug trafficking in home country
description: ICE arrested a Brazilian national wanted for drug trafficking in his home country.

title: ICE Newark investigation leads to conviction of Pennsylvania man for conspiring to distribute cocaine
description: A Pennsylvania man was found guilty of conspiring to distribute cocaine following an U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement investigation. Marvin Murphy, 48, of Philadelphia, was convicted on March 18 after a two-day bench trial at the U.S. District Court for the District of New Jersey in Camden. Murphy was remanded into custody after the verdict.

title: Child Exploitation ICE, partnersâ€™ rapid response locate suspect at Newark airport attempting to flee the US
description: ICE, assisted by other law enforcement agencies, located and apprehended a Hungarian national at Newark Liberty International Airport who was wanted for allegedly raping a child.

title: ICE arrests Brazilian national for selling fake Social Security cards and green cards
description: An illegally present Brazilian national was arrested for allegedly selling fraudulent Social Security cards and Legal Permanent Resident cards.

title: Driver of second human smuggling vehicle involved in 2021 Southwest Texas incident sentenced to 10 years in federal prison following ICE Del Rio and federal partner investigation
description: A Salvadoran man was sentenced to 10 years in prison for his role in a 2021 human smuggling operation that resulted in the death of eight people. The investigation was conducted by ICE with assistance from U.S. Border Patrol and the Texas Department of Public Safety.

title: ICE San Franciso and partners take transnational criminal off the streets in California
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement arrested Gurdev Singh, an Indian national, as part of a targeted criminal enforcement action after he was found to be associated with transnational criminal organizations and illegally carrying firearms.

title: DHS, ICE, and interagency enforcement arrest and extradite Honduran criminal alien
description: Arrest and extradition of Eswin Mejia, a Honduran criminal alien wanted in connection with a 2016 motor vehicle homicide in Douglas County, Nebraska.

title: ICE, law enforcement partners arrest 370 alien offenders during enhanced operation in Massachusetts
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement and federal law enforcement partners apprehended 370 illegal aliens in Massachusetts during an enhanced targeted enforcement operation focusing on transnational organized crime, gangs, and egregious illegal alien offenders.

title: ICE, federal partner investigation results in 2 men convicted, 1 extradited from Guatemala for role in 2022 San Antonio alien smuggling mass casualty incident
description: Two men were convicted for their roles in a 2022 mass casualty alien smuggling event in San Antonio, Texas that resulted in 53 deaths. A third man was extradited from Guatemala to face justice in the case.
